title: The Real Life Serial Killers of MINDHUNTER Season 2!
author: Think Story
comment: After all the research I did someone better delete my internet history...
Man the makeup team and actors that portrayed the killers did an amazing job this season.
The actor playing Ed kemper is so good, playing friendly with a hint of malice so easily
The casting is so creepily on point.
Wtf the son of Sam actor looks EXACTLY the same as the actual dude
description:
I take a deep dive and explore the real life serial killers that inspired season 2 of Netflix's Mindhunter. From Charles Manson, Ed Kemper, and the BTK killer (Dennis Rader) we'll take a look at every one.
